title: How to write an in-text citation and reference list in APA format - Quora

response.answer_text: APA provides several guidelines for reference and citation formatting. Reference formatting, in particular, depends on the source, such as a book, periodical, or other. An in-text citation should exist wherever each reference is used and is more straight forward (see examples). Example: Ness, L.R. (2005, Nov/Dec). Assessing the Relationships among IT flexibility, strategic alignment, and IT effectiveness: Study overview and findings. Journal of IT Management (JITM), XVI(2), 1-17.
